creator: Wavey Feet Games
descriptionHtml:
Get Ready to become a City Builder Tycoon by getting training in City Construction & Megapolis City Building Sim. Drive construction vehicles of city construction to build your dream city truck games. Drive multiple heavy machines and vehicles like Excavators, Dump Truck, Backhoe, Drum Roller, mixer, Loaders, Bulldozer. Welcome to the world of Idle City Construction 3D Excavator and Driving games, where you will enjoy the realistic construction training. Play incredible construction excavator truck games. Here you can learn construction facts with truck games and truck construction games. Select your favorite construction Truck and drive it to complete your task of City Construction Tycoon. Experience Construction Machine Training with challenging city building construction missions. Become the most creative Construction Excavator Tycoon the world's ever seen because you are now the part of city builder truck games. First get excavator training and then start developing your own strategy in Megapolis and Idle City Construction Tycoon Game.

Building Construction Training & Construction Excavator Game contained multiple Heavy machinery like Excavators, Dump Truck, Backhoe, Loaders, Bulldozer and many more. Become construction truck owner in builder game. It's a great opportunity to operate a construction excavator, loader truck, heavy duty vehicle, heavy machinery transport and digger simulator. The sand excavator building trucks construction games helps lift a large amount of sand in construction simulator games. Become a city builder tycoon by managing your heavy machinery transport. Drive a Heavy Lorry to build an empire for your citizens. Enjoy a construction excavator with a dump truck transporting the material. Be a monster construction truck driver in this city building sim and megapolis. Road building construction game is not a simple game because it will train you properly for machinery use. Play our city construction excavator operate game.

You can get behind the wheel of new heavy machines. Exciting tasks of the Construction Simulator are waiting to be completed. There's always something new to explore in the world of Construction Training Tycoon. Drive heavy duty sand excavator, forklift, heavy bulldozer or drum roller in excavator games and other construction simulators forklift in heavy construction simulator city building games. As you start from scratch assisted by your mentor or Builder, you get bigger and more interesting construction jobs to grow your City Building Construction Training company and expand your fleet. Take pride in your accomplishments as you ride through the city. In a City Building Games construction excavator simulator as a long trailer driver your task is to load different materials from markets and deliver them to Construction sites for excavator games and crane games. Perform all Heavy Duty to become the monster truck driver in City Building Construction Sim.

Features of Construction excavator Operator & City Building Sim:
1) Over 10 machines, vehicles, trucks & attachments
2) Challenge yourself with multiple contracts
3) Construction Training and heavy machinery license
4) Become Construction excavator driver
5) Heavy Excavator truck driving
6) Define task of city building construction
7) Improved graphics of jcb game
8) Realistic construction environment

Start your training with Construction excavator operator Training to get knowledge about all the machinery controls. Once you complete your jcb training you can drive any type of heavy duty machinery. You can get the job of City Builders ,construction contractor and can complete the task on time. Tycoon Building Simulation is a new city builder game, City Island sim games. Excavator Simulation games come with a lot of cool building construction tasks. If you like tycoon-style building construction games then you will love this Construction Training Simulator. Don't miss the golden opportunity to train yourself.
descriptionShort: Get Construction Training and Become Builder Tycoon in Heavy Excavator Games.
title: Construction Excavator Operate
